overview:
Thomas Croma develops proprietary software for optimizing nugget inventory across multiple distribution centers.

Croma’s flagship product, NugaTizer, is currently used by over 500 restaurants across the United States and has been recognized as one of the top 10 software accomplishments in the food and beverage industry during the past decade. His latest release of the software, planned for January 2011, will incorporate tools for managing condiment-to-nugget ratiosâ€”a feature that has never before been offered in existing software packages.
